MATIC-AUD.summary: Polygon (MATIC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Polygon has a current supply of 10,000,000,000 with 5,188,388,130 in circulation. The last known price of Polygon is 0.78758827 USD and is up 1.72 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 115 active market(s) with $956,980,487.94 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://polygon.technology/.
